name: Cameleon
short_description: Cameleon is a java application built with open source tools as a tutorial for the following ideas and technologies:Test Driven Development , ANT build system , Maven2 , JUnit , jMock , java profilers , FindBugs , Cobertura , Jalopy , CheckStyle , PMD
